channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: DJ Mustard Plays Surprise Set at Weedmaps’ LA Kickback Event
item.description: 🔥 Spinning surprise beats! DJ Mustard lights up Weedmaps' LA Kickback event with epic vibes 🎶✨ #DJMustard #MusicNews

item.title: Camila Cabello Shares Live Cover of Natalie Imbruglia’s ’90s Hit ‘Torn’ From Australia
item.description: 🌟Travel back to the '90s with Camila Cabello's epic cover of 'Torn'! 🎶 #ThrowbackThursday #CamilaCabello #MusicCover

item.title: AI Revives Chalino Sánchez on ‘Rigo Campos’ Cover With Los Tucanes de Tijuana: ‘Technology Got Us Together’
item.description: 🎶 AI meets legendary Chalino Sánchez on 'Rigo Campos' cover with Los Tucanes de Tijuana! 🤖🎸 #MusicInnovation

item.title: MTV will be temporarily bringing back round-the-clock music videos ahead of VMAs 2025
item.description: 🎶 Pump up the volume! MTV is switching back to music videos 24/7 before VMAs 2025 📺 Let the music takeover! 🎉 #MTV #MusicVideos #VMAs

item.title: Gorillaz Bring Live Debuts, Rarities, & Miho Hatori To House Of Kong Residency Kickoff
item.description: 🎉 Gorillaz are shaking things up with live debuts and rarities at House of Kong! Who's ready for the party? 🎶🦍 #Gorillaz #HouseofKong
